articles.author: Steve Aschburner
articles.title: 2025 NBA Finals: 4 things to watch for in Game 7 of Finals - NBA
articles.description: If this series and history are any judge, expect a competitive, unpredictable Game 7 between Oklahoma City and Indiana.
articles.content:
Unpredictability is the only guarantee as Oklahoma City and Indiana vie for the championship in Game 7.
OKLAHOMA CITY For every stat about Game 7 in the NBA Finals, it seems theres a counter-stat.
